# Summary Operations
[TOC]

Summaries provide a way to export condensed information about a model, which is
then accessible in tools such as [TensorBoard](../../get_started/summaries_and_tensorboard.md).

<h2 id="Generation_of_Summaries">Generation of Summaries</h2>

### Class for writing Summaries
*   [`tf.summary.FileWriter`](../../api_docs/python/tf/summary/FileWriter.md)
*   [`tf.summary.FileWriterCache`](../../api_docs/python/tf/summary/FileWriterCache.md)

### Summary Ops
*   [`tf.summary.tensor_summary`](../../api_docs/python/tf/summary/tensor_summary.md)
*   [`tf.summary.scalar`](../../api_docs/python/tf/summary/scalar.md)
*   [`tf.summary.histogram`](../../api_docs/python/tf/summary/histogram.md)
*   [`tf.summary.audio`](../../api_docs/python/tf/summary/audio.md)
*   [`tf.summary.image`](../../api_docs/python/tf/summary/image.md)
*   [`tf.summary.merge`](../../api_docs/python/tf/summary/merge.md)
*   [`tf.summary.merge_all`](../../api_docs/python/tf/summary/merge_all.md)
